name: secondary-chat
title: Chat with advanced interactions
author: ZwerOxotnik
description:
Adds draggable chat, new chat commands, new chat types, new chat interactions (for example: localised messages, storing previous sent message, offline/online players/teams, relationships, filters etc), new hotkeys for chat. Provides customizable chat through mod interface, chat settings.
+ 🇷🇺 🇺🇦 🇷🇴 🇮🇹 🇪🇸 locales
